RelatedSentence: The idea of the three countries sharing intelligence with each other about North Korea 's missile launches is not new , according to Marine Corps Lt. Col. Jeff Pool , a Pentagon spokesman who specializes in Asian issues .

The idea of the three countries sharing intelligence with each other about North Korea 's missile launches is not new , according to Marine Corps Lt. Col. Jeff Pool , a Pentagon spokesman who specializes in Asian issues .
